subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Trainer Nick Zito has sent out 16 consecutive losing horses in the Kentucky Derby since he won the race in 1994. But Zito is well positioned for his latest assault on Churchill Downs.
snippet: Trainer Nick Zito has sent out 16 consecutive losing horses in the Kentucky Derby since he won the race in 1994. But Zito is well positioned for his latest assault on Churchill Downs.
